biotools.summary: CircPlant is a tool for the exploration of plant circRNAs, their potential role as competing endogenous RNAs (ceRNAs), as well as function annotation. In addition to high efficiency and usability, CircPlant is confirmed to have robust high sensitivity and accuracy in detecting plant circRNAs, by analyzing simulated and real RNA-Seq datasets from Arabidopsis thaliana and Oryza sativa.
